original: 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
analyzed: 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /

original: klu mo rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o ////
analyzed: klu mo rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o ////
translated: Chapter on the extensive ritual methods for accomplishing the nāgas from the king of tantras, the Tamer of Spirits.

original: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro zhing gser te khro bo 'di dang bcas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro zhing gser te khro bo 'di dang bcas nas gsungs pa /

original: aom bha ra na badzra h'um che ge mo n'a gi ni a'a karsha ya h'um h'um phat phat/
analyzed: aom bha ra na badzra h'um che ge mo n'a gi ni a'a karsha ya h'um h'um phat phat/

analyzed: de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis klu thams cad brgyal zhing 'gyel te spyi bo'i nad chen pos shi'o //
translated: Then, merely by explaining this, all nāgas fainted, fell down, and died from a great illness on their heads.

translated: If they transgress the samaya, by reciting this with the wrathful one, they will quickly die and fall into the eight great hells. Thus it was said by Śrī Vajradhara.

original: 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /
analyzed: 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /
translated: From the great king of tantras, the Tamer of Spirits.

analyzed: klu mo rnams sgrub par byed pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o ////

original: de nas 'khor @190a *//
analyzed: de nas 'khor @190a *//

analyzed: aom ma no ha ri sv'a h'a /

original: aom su bha ga sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom su bha ga sv'a h'a /

analyzed: aom bi sh'a la ne tri sv'a h'a /

analyzed: aom su ra bhi pri ye sv'a h'a / aom aa sha mu khi sv'a h'a /

original: aom pi sha ka ra mu khi sv'a h'a/
analyzed: aom pi sha ka ra mu khi sv'a h'a/
translated: Oṃ piśākamukhi svāhā.

original: de nas mi'am ci mo drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa /
analyzed: de nas mi'am ci mo drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa /

original: ri'i rtse mo la song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na /
analyzed: ri'i rtse mo la song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na /

original: nam phyed na nges par 'ong ste /
analyzed: nam phyed na nges par 'ong ste /
translated: At midnight, they will definitely come.

original: de la 'jigs par ma byas na /
analyzed: de la 'jigs par ma byas na /
translated: If one is not afraid of them,

original: kye sgrub pa po /
analyzed: kye sgrub pa po /
translated: they will say, “Kye, practitioner!

original: bka' ci stsol ces smra bar byed do //
analyzed: bka' ci stsol ces smra bar byed do //
translated: She will say, What can I do for you?

original: sgrub pos kyang kye bzang mo /
analyzed: sgrub pos kyang kye bzang mo /
translated: The practitioner should say, O good woman,

original: bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras nas rgyab tu zhon na /
analyzed: bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras nas rgyab tu zhon na /
translated: be my wife! and mount her back.🔽She will carry him to the world of gods and give him excellent food.

analyzed: lha'i 'jig rten du 'khyer bar byed cing bza' ba bzang po ster bar byed do; ;de nas sgrub pa'i thabs phyi ma bshad pa /

analyzed: ri'i drung ngam gtsug lhag khang du khri bzlas na /

analyzed: bzlas pa'i mtha' la rang nyid 'ong zhing /
translated: at the end of the recitation she will come herself.

original: lha mo'i lag pa 'jam pos rkang pa la nyug par byed cing /
analyzed: lha mo'i lag pa 'jam pos rkang pa la nyug par byed cing /

original: myur du chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: myur du chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur zhing /
translated: If one quickly engages in passion, she will become one's wife

original: dong rtse brgyad dang / gos zung gcig ster bar byed do //
analyzed: dong rtse brgyad dang / gos zung gcig ster bar byed do //
translated: and give eight kārṣāpaṇas and a pair of garments.

analyzed: chu bo'i 'gram du song nas khri bzlas nas yang mtshan thog @190b bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo //
translated: If one goes to the bank of a river and recites ten thousand times, and again recites throughout the night, she will definitely come at dawn.

analyzed: 'ongs nas chung mar 'gyur zhing nyi ma re re dong rtse lnga ster bar byed do //
translated: When she comes, she will become one's wife and give five kārṣāpaṇas every day.

analyzed: mtshan mo chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na /

analyzed: bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong zhing lta bar byed do //

analyzed: nyi ma gnyis pa la mdun du 'dug cing gtam smra bar byed do //
translated: On the second day, she will sit in front and speak.

original: nyi ma gsum pa la chags pa spyad na nges par 'grub cing chung ma'i las thams cad byed la dong tse brgyad dang / ras phrugs gcig ste bar byed do //
analyzed: nyi ma gsum pa la chags pa spyad na nges par 'grub cing chung ma'i las thams cad byed la dong tse brgyad dang / ras phrugs gcig ste bar byed do //
translated: On the third day, if one engages in passion, she will certainly be accomplished, and will do all the work of a wife, and will give eight gold coins and a garment.

analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin du ri'i rtse mor sha za zhing khri khri bzlas na /

analyzed: lha mo'i gzugs kyis myur du 'ongs shing mdun du sdod do //

analyzed: 'khyud cing 'o byas te mi smra bas chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur te /

analyzed: dong rtse brgyad stong ster zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed do //

analyzed: 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /

analyzed: mi rnams kyi rgyal srid grub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /

original: yi ge bzhi po cher gsang ba /
analyzed: yi ge bzhi po cher gsang ba /

original: dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed pa /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed pa /

analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: For the benefit of the vajra master, the method of accomplishing the great glorious one, the means of accomplishing the bhūta who is to be accomplished by the vajra master,

analyzed: 'byung mo rnams kyis ni /

analyzed: dpal khro bo'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'bum bzlas na /

analyzed: de nas zla ba nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing mtshan thog thag bzla'o //

analyzed: de nas tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo //

analyzed: 'ongs pa la tsandan gyi mchod yon sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod na /

original: kye sgrub pa po /
analyzed: kye sgrub pa po /

analyzed: ci bka' stsal zhes smra'o //

analyzed: zhi ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang po'o //

analyzed: de nas gzhan yang nan tur gyis sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa /

translated: One should write the name of the woman one desires on a birchbark leaf, and at night, naked, one should recite [the mantra] eight thousand times in front of glorious Vajradhara. She will quickly come.

analyzed: 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na dga' bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid kyang ster bar byed do //
translated: She will grant even the kingdom of the three worlds.

original: brgya byin kyang ster ro //
analyzed: brgya byin kyang ster ro //

analyzed: rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su yang 'khyer zhing lo khri 'tsho'o //

analyzed: gal te ma grub na; mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing skam la skad cig de nyid la 'chi'o //

analyzed: zhes khro bo nyid kyis gsungs so //

analyzed: gur gum gyi ming bris te rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing yi ge h'um h'um phat phat lan bdun brjod na /

analyzed: brjod par gyur pas nges par skad cig gis 'chi bar byed do //
